constantValues: Special type of activity that includes description of the resolution, billing status, and the duration of the case.

definitions.description: Special type of activity that includes description of the resolution, billing status, and the duration of the case.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information that describes the case resolution.

members.description: Type additional information that describes the case resolution.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the activitypointer with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the activitypointer with respect to the base currency.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Service' adds the 'serviceId' attribute below to the 'CaseResolution' entity as a key

members.name: stateCode

arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the case resolution is open, completed, or canceled. By default, all case resolutions are completed and the status value can't be changed.

members.description: Shows whether the case resolution is open, completed, or canceled. By default, all case resolutions are completed and the status value can't be changed.

arguments.name: statusCode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the case resolution activity.

members.description: Reason for the status of the case resolution activity.
